typeDescription.name: eu.excitement.type.predicatetruth.PredicateTruthValue
typeDescription.description: This type provides labels for PredicateTruth. This type is a string subtype that only permits "PT+", "PT-", and "PT?".

typeDescription.name: eu.excitement.type.predicatetruth.PredicateTruth
typeDescription.description: This type represents a predicate truth value annotation.

featureDescription.name: value
featureDescription.description: This represents the value of the annotation.

typeDescription.name: eu.excitement.type.predicatetruth.ClauseTruthValue
typeDescription.description: This type provides labels for ClauseTruth. This type is a string subtype that only permits "CT+", "CT-", and "CT?".

typeDescription.name: eu.excitement.type.predicatetruth.ClauseTruth
typeDescription.description: This type represents a clause truth value annotation.

featureDescription.name: value
featureDescription.description: This represents the value of the annotation.

typeDescription.name: eu.excitement.type.predicatetruth.NegationAndUncertainty
typeDescription.description: This type represents a negation-and-uncertainty annotation.

featureDescription.name: value
featureDescription.description: This represents the value of the annotation.

typeDescription.name: eu.excitement.type.predicatetruth.NegationAndUncertaintyValue
typeDescription.description: This type provides labels for NegationAndUncerntainty. This type is a string subtype that only permits "NU+", "NU-", and "NU?".

typeDescription.name: eu.excitement.type.predicatetruth.PredicateSignature
typeDescription.description: This type represents an implication signature of a predicate.

typeDescription.name: eu.excitement.type.predicatetruth.PredicateSignatureValue
typeDescription.description: This type provides labels for PredicateSignature. This type is a string subtype that only permits one of the following strings: "+ / -", "+ / ?", "? / -", "- \ +", "- / ?", "? / +", "+ / +", "- / -", "? / ?".
